sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_0586_til_post"> <x_0586_til_post action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <category display_value="Note">83f60c3e1b8154908ed631d7dc4bcbaa</category> <github_id>87</github_id> <github_url>https://github.com/iamkalai/SNTIL/issues/87</github_url> <message>Event name is case sensitive in ServiceNow scripts for the events to generate using gs.eventQueue. Ex: If the event name is 'pickUp', gs.eventQueue("pickup",current) will not work as ServiceNow will treat it as an unregistered event.</message> <number>TIL0001088</number> <status>old</status> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-02-25 12:19:58</sys_created_on> <sys_id>dc7bb9032fbd811051dad5f62799b649</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-03-01 12:26:39</sys_updated_on> <title>Event name is case sensitive for event generation in scripts</title> </x_0586_til_post> </record_update>
